Taunton.Peter Walker House:
The Peter Walker House is a historic colonial house located at 1679 Somerset Avenue in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
Built in about 1727, this 2-1/2 story, Georgian style, wood-framed house is the oldest documented house in the city. It is five bays wide and two bays deep, with a side-gable roof and a large central chimney.
